sentences.sContent: Advertising is a potent force in showing smoking as a socially acceptable habit.
sentences.sCn: 广告的力量很大，把吸烟说成为社会所接受的习惯。

sentences.sContent: A good company pension scheme remains a potent weapon for attracting staff.
sentences.sCn: 良好的公司养老金计划依然是吸引员工的有效武器。

synos.tran: 有效的；强有力的，有权势的；有说服力的

words.tran: 有说服力地；强有力地；有效力地
统治者，君主；有权势的人

trans.tranOther: having a very powerful effect or influence on your body or mind
